body: Skills/Qualifications:A good level of Czech or Polish language is mandatory(English or Romanian is a must)Customer ServiceGeneral KnowledgeQuality FocusProblem SolvingFinancial KnowledgeDocumentation SkillsListening SkillsCommunication Skills,Risk Management Skills / Problem Resolving Multi-taskingCustomer Service Representative Job Duties:· Attracts potential customers by answering product and service questions; suggesting information about other products and services.· Client assistance in account creation procese.· Maintains customer records by updating account information.· Resolves product or service problems by clarifying the customer's complaint; determining the cause of the problem; selecting and explaining the best solution to solve the problem; expediting correction or adjustment; following up to ensure resolution.· Analyzing customers needs in order to match them· Prepares product or service reports by collecting and analyzing customer information.· Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.For all of the above we offer you:•	Fixed salary •	Monthly and annual bonuses•	Monthly earnings above the average•	Opportunity to promote in upper management•	Full time job with 8 hours/day contract•	Powerful brands•	Luxury office in a high-end business environment•	Company phone•	Personal computer•	Possibility to work and promote in our foreign offices•	Free specialized training sessions based on sales techniques, personal development and more
title: Czech or Polish Customer Service Representative
locations: Piata presei libere, București, Municipiul București, România
